tool.name: Rank Based Gene Ontology Analysis
tool.command: ln -s '${input1}' samples.tsv && ln -s '${input2}' annotation.tsv && Rscript $__tool_directory__/GO_MWU.R -s $__tool_directory__ -i samples.tsv -a annotation.tsv -g $__tool_directory__/go.obo -d '$input3' -c '$input_filter.cluster' -o '$input_filter.over' -m '$input_filter.min' -p '$grouping.pcut' -t '$grouping.hcut' && mv ${input3}_samples.tsv div_input.tsv && mv dissim_${input3}_samples.tsv_annotation.tsv dissim.tsv && mv MWU_${input3}_samples.tsv mwu_file.tsv

param.name: input1
param.label: Genes of interest with associated value

param.name: over
param.label: Filter out GO categories that have more than this fraction of total number of genes

param.name: min
param.label: Consider GO categories that have at least this many genes

param.name: pcut
param.label: Adjusted p-value cutoff for representative GO

param.name: hcut
param.label: Height at which to cut the GO terms tree to get 'independent groups'

tool.help:
========================================================== Rank-based Gene Ontology Analysis with Adaptive Clustering ==========================================================
Usage: GO_MWU.R [
-[-help|h]]
--scriptdir | -s <character>
--input | -i <character>
--goAnnotations | -a <character>
--goDatabase | -g <character>
--goDivision | -d <character>
--threads | -t <integer>
--pcut | -p <double>
--hcut | -c <double>
